extendedInfo.description: Let's experience a revolutionary brick breaking game that sets a new standard of fun over any break out style game youâve ever played! We've got 60 levels and 3 different modes of speed (slow, medium & fast) for you to conquer. Break your first brick to start a revolution today!How to play: Touch the bottom part of the screen (or use the track ball) to control the paddle to prevent the ball from hitting the bottom. Remove all the bricks to level up. You can turn off the sound in the stage selection screen(top right button).Notes: The permissions required in this game is only used for online leader board. Thanks.

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: It\'s ok but from level 30 onwards it gets very frustrating to play as some bricks are almost impossible to reach and also the glitch that seems to get mentioned alot.
reviews.author: Darren Wiltshire

reviews.title: Love that there are so many levels
reviews.comment: Wish you could get the unbreakable bricks out of the way in level 26-27. But other wise great game. Thanks again
reviews.author: Sheila Adams

reviews.title: Do not install this game.
reviews.comment: If u dont mind restarting every level because ur ball gets stuck. I played up to 30 levels until i lost interest after restarting every level atleast 20 times cause of a glitch. The worst game iv ever played.
reviews.author: burbert liski

reviews.title: Good, needs work
reviews.comment: A little glitchy, ball gets stuck, hits \'invisible bricks\' and gets caught in loops
reviews.author: Cody Hannigan

reviews.title: I love it... But
reviews.comment: I also hate the fact that the ball gets stuck a lot. I have to restart the level over and over.. You should add a shaker or something. Other than that, am enjoying it. Thanks. Fix the problem and I\'ll give you 5 stars.  ;-)
reviews.author: Gabriela Diaz

reviews.title: Breaking bricks
reviews.comment: Just downloaded game today, so far so good. I like it. Good graffics, and overall just a good, classic game. Thank you.      As of 9/1/13, I\'m having problems trying to start game. I select stage 8, but wont do anything, sometimes it will play if i hold it down, but not all the time. Please help. I really do like this game.
reviews.author: Rebecca Talley

reviews.title: My Favorite game ever !!
reviews.comment: This game rocks and yes your ball will get stuck sometimes. Im on level 69 and I haven\'t had problems!! This game is awesome and you should get it if you like to break stuck!!!!
reviews.author: Sydney Jordan

reviews.title: Ball gets stuck a lot!
reviews.comment: Would love to give it 5 stars, but the ball gets stuck every couple if levels and I have to restart it! This causes my scores to be erased! Very frustrating, but a very addictive game! Fix it\'s flaws and you have 5 stars!
reviews.author: Jason Deiana

reviews.title: Glitch on 20
reviews.comment: Game is cool, great way to pass time. But level 20 it gets stuck. The ball keeps doing the same repetitive thing and there is no way of getting it to stop. I lose the scores and have to restart.  Frustrating. Would rate higher if you could fix problem
reviews.author: Corey Sanders

reviews.title: I love this game
reviews.comment: I remember this game. when video games first came out.yes I\'m that old. I have no problem with my game on my phone
reviews.author: Dwayne Ray

reviews.title: Not bad...
reviews.comment: Not a bad game but I couldn\'t find anywhere to turn the sound effects off.
reviews.author: Ken M

reviews.title: Waistage of time...
reviews.comment: The ball stuck and i could not break all bricks..  i played 32 round... plz fix the problems as soob as possible.
reviews.author: Kamaldeep Kaur Rana

reviews.title: Game suck\'s
reviews.comment: This game start out fun then the Ball gets trapped all the time -5 stars
reviews.author: GW ric

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: ITS HORRIBLE!!!!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!!!! DO NOT!!!!
reviews.author: Makeina Frye

reviews.title: Need to do something about level 20
reviews.comment: Level 20 sucks the ball keeps getting stuck and just bounce back and  forth
reviews.author: Sandrea Wilson

reviews.title: Mechlle seals
reviews.comment: Love this. Game it helps me for my hands
reviews.author: mechelle seals

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: At level 20 and then 30 the ball freezes on the bricks. I gave up on it now. I can\'t pass level 30 b`cause of the ball freeze.
reviews.author: Eva Kiss
